title: Trump To Make US "Crypto Capital Of Planet", Bitcoin "Superpower Of World"
content: Former President Donald Trump has promised to make the US a "Bitcoin superpower" if returned to the White House and said that he will appoint an advisory council to design transparent regulatory guidance for the benefit of the entire industry.
summary: Former President Donald Trump has promised to make the US a "Bitcoin superpower" if returned to the White House and said that he will appoint an advisory council to design transparent regulatory guidance for the benefit of the entire industry.

title: "In 4 Years, You Won't Have To Vote Again," Donald Trump Tells Christians
content: Republican nominee Donald Trump has told Christians that if they vote for him in the November presidential elections, he will fix everything so well that they won't have to vote again.
summary: Republican nominee Donald Trump has told Christians that if they vote for him in the November presidential elections, he will fix everything so well that they won't have to vote again.

title: Kamala Harris Says "Underdog" Campaign Will Overcome Trump's "Wild Lies"
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris on Saturday acknowledged the uphill climb to defeating Donald Trump in November, but said her freshly-minted presidential campaign would prevail over the "wild lies" of her Republican rival.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris on Saturday acknowledged the uphill climb to defeating Donald Trump in November, but said her freshly-minted presidential campaign would prevail over the "wild lies" of her Republican rival.

title: "Will Pay Heavy Price": Netanyahu Warns Hezbollah After Air Strike Kills 11
content: A rocket fired from Lebanon hit a football pitch in an Arab town in the Israeli-annexed Golan Heights Saturday, killing 11 youngsters in what the army described as the "deadliest attack on Israeli civilians since October 7".
summary: A rocket fired from Lebanon hit a football pitch in an Arab town in the Israeli-annexed Golan Heights Saturday, killing 11 youngsters in what the army described as the "deadliest attack on Israeli civilians since October 7".

title: "Will Pay Heavy Price": Netanyahu Warns Hezbollah After Strike Kills 10
content: A rocket fired from Lebanon hit a football pitch in an Arab town in the Israeli-annexed Golan Heights Saturday, killing 11 youngsters in what the army described as the "deadliest attack on Israeli civilians since October 7".
summary: A rocket fired from Lebanon hit a football pitch in an Arab town in the Israeli-annexed Golan Heights Saturday, killing 11 youngsters in what the army described as the "deadliest attack on Israeli civilians since October 7".

title: "It's British. We're Used To Rain": UK PM Shrugs Off Paris Olympics Photo
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer Saturday brushed off the fascination with a viral image taken at the Paris Olympic Games opening ceremony showing him as the only dignitary not wearing a protective plastic poncho during driving rain.
summary: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer Saturday brushed off the fascination with a viral image taken at the Paris Olympic Games opening ceremony showing him as the only dignitary not wearing a protective plastic poncho during driving rain.

title: "Support For Israel Iron-Clad": US Condemns "Horrific" Missile Attack
content: The White House on Saturday condemned a missile attack on a Druze village in northern Israel, calling the strike, which killed 11 people, including children, on a soccer pitch "horrific."
summary: The White House on Saturday condemned a missile attack on a Druze village in northern Israel, calling the strike, which killed 11 people, including children, on a soccer pitch "horrific."

title: Israel Army Says Hezbollah Fired Rocket That Killed 10 In Annexed Golan
content: Ten people, including children, were killed in a rocket attack on a football ground in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights on Saturday, Israel's N12 News reported, the worst incident yet in months of violence between Israel and armed groups in Lebanon
summary: Ten people, including children, were killed in a rocket attack on a football ground in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights on Saturday, Israel's N12 News reported, the worst incident yet in months of violence between Israel and armed groups in Lebanon

title: 4 Hezbollah Fighters Killed In Israeli Strike As Tensions Flare-Up: Report
content: An Israeli strike on south Lebanon killed four fighters of Iran-backed operative group Hezbollah on Saturday, a security source told AFP.
summary: An Israeli strike on south Lebanon killed four fighters of Iran-backed operative group Hezbollah on Saturday, a security source told AFP.

title: UK Police Arrest Two Men After Assault On Anti-Fascism Protester
content: UK police arrested two men on Saturday following an assault on a participant in an anti-fascism protest, held to counter another nearby demonstration organised by far-right agitator Tommy Robinson.
summary: UK police arrested two men on Saturday following an assault on a participant in an anti-fascism protest, held to counter another nearby demonstration organised by far-right agitator Tommy Robinson.

title: Trump Vows To Hold Rallies With More Security Despite Assassination Attempt
content: Presidential candidate Donald Trump said Saturday he will return to holding outdoor rallies with additional Secret Service protection, two weeks after he was injured in an assassination attempt at an open-air campaign event.
summary: Presidential candidate Donald Trump said Saturday he will return to holding outdoor rallies with additional Secret Service protection, two weeks after he was injured in an assassination attempt at an open-air campaign event.

title: Tourists Duped Into Eating Dog Meat In Bali, Authorities Launch Crackdown
content: On Thursday, Bali officials seized hundreds of kilograms of raw dog meat and numerous skewers from vendors.
summary: On Thursday, Bali officials seized hundreds of kilograms of raw dog meat and numerous skewers from vendors.

title: 11-Year-Old Chinese Boy Writes 600 Lines Of Code To Build Rocket
content: Yan's interest in rockets began when he witnessed the Long March-2 liftoff at the age of four.
summary: Yan's interest in rockets began when he witnessed the Long March-2 liftoff at the age of four.

title: How El Chapo's Son Helped US Arrest Famous Narco Chief El Mayo
content: As a propeller plane on Thursday whirred towards the U.S.-Mexico border to cross illegally, U.S. agents raced to meet it at a small municipal airport near El Paso, Texas, and arrest two men who were part of Mexican drug trafficking royalty.
summary: As a propeller plane on Thursday whirred towards the U.S.-Mexico border to cross illegally, U.S. agents raced to meet it at a small municipal airport near El Paso, Texas, and arrest two men who were part of Mexican drug trafficking royalty.

title: Donald Trump Tells Christians They Won't Have To Vote After This Election
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump told Christians on Friday that if they vote for him this November, "in four years, you don't have to vote again. We'll have it fixed so good, you're not gonna have to vote."
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump told Christians on Friday that if they vote for him this November, "in four years, you don't have to vote again. We'll have it fixed so good, you're not gonna have to vote."

title: 170 Killed, Hundreds Wounded In Days-Long Israeli Operation In Gaza
content: Gaza's civil defence agency said Saturday that Israel's military operation around Khan Yunis has killed about 170 people and wounded hundreds since it started on Monday.
summary: Gaza's civil defence agency said Saturday that Israel's military operation around Khan Yunis has killed about 170 people and wounded hundreds since it started on Monday.

title: Blinken Raises Concern Over China's "Provocative" Actions Around Taiwan
content: The United States hailed "open and productive" discussions between China's foreign minister and Secretary of State Antony Blinken in Laos on Saturday in which Blinken raised US concerns over Beijing's "provocative actions" around Taiwan.
summary: The United States hailed "open and productive" discussions between China's foreign minister and Secretary of State Antony Blinken in Laos on Saturday in which Blinken raised US concerns over Beijing's "provocative actions" around Taiwan.

title: Passengers Struggle As France Suffers Second Day Of Sabotage Train Delays
content: Tens of thousands of rail passengers struggled through a second day of cancelled trains Saturday as investigators tracked saboteurs who paralysed the network just ahead of the Paris Olympics opening ceremony.
summary: Tens of thousands of rail passengers struggled through a second day of cancelled trains Saturday as investigators tracked saboteurs who paralysed the network just ahead of the Paris Olympics opening ceremony.

title: As Racist Attacks Fly, Republicans Grapple With How To Take On Harris
content: Republican nominee Donald Trump has called her "crazy," "nuts" and "dumb as a rock." Republicans in Congress disparage her as a diversity hire.
summary: Republican nominee Donald Trump has called her "crazy," "nuts" and "dumb as a rock." Republicans in Congress disparage her as a diversity hire.

title: Killer Whales Sink Yacht In Mediterranean Sea In Harrowing 2-Hour Attack
content: The pod of five first targeted the rudder, rendering the sailboat unable to steer after approximately 15 strikes.
summary: The pod of five first targeted the rudder, rendering the sailboat unable to steer after approximately 15 strikes.
